Legal_Issue: Denial of procedural fairness due to bias
Application_Facts: Ms. Fletcher had significant connections to Canada but did not meet physical presence requirement; judge made comments suggesting pre-determination
Court_Ruling: Decision was reasonable despite inappropriate comments by the judge
Defendant_Behavior: Citizenship Judge exhibited potential bias in comments but reviewed evidence
Legal_Standard: Strict application of physical presence under Pourghasemi test
Assessment_Factor: Number of days physically present in Canada
Review_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to Citizenship Judge's decision
Evidence_Used: Judge’s evaluation of applicant's ties to Canada
Legal_Provision_Cited: Section 5 of the Citizenship Act (residency requirement)
Application_Basis: Physical presence in Canada for minimum required days
Evidence_Assessed: Duration and pattern of residence in Canada
Relief_Sought: Allowance of appeal and remittal for new hearing
Governing_Rule: Residency determined by strict counting of days under Pourghasemi test
No reasonable apprehension of bias required
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Failure to demonstrate sufficient days of physical presence in Canada
Harm_Assessment: Denial of citizenship rights due to non-compliance and procedural concerns
Cause_Description: Ms. Fletcher’s citizenship application was denied due to insufficient residency days and perceived bias
Evidence_Handling: Judge reviewed available evidence on residency and connections to Canada
Legal_Provision_Violated: Section 5(1)(a) of the Citizenship Act – residency requirement
Evidence_Issues: Disputed interpretation of time spent in Canada
Lack of documentation to support continuous residence
Residency_Compliance: Not met – failed to satisfy 1095-day physical presence requirement
Evidence_Assessment: Judge applied strict test under Pourghasemi; considered but rejected connection-based arguments
Decision_Rationale: The decision was found to be within the range of reasonable outcomes despite problematic comments
Legal_Standard_Applied: Strict physical presence test for residency
